title: The Villainess Pushed Everything on the Mob Character - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Business Management   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Nobles   Obsessive Love   Royalty   Short Story   Villainess Noble Girls

description:
Emilia was chosen as the Crown Prince’s fiancee because of the villainess, who regained her past life’s memories…

However, the ex-villainess has failed every reincarnation cliche, so Emilia and the Crown Prince have been busy wiping her ass.>
